GSD.product_version: versions from v3.12 to before v4.14.298
GSD.description:
drm/msm/hdmi: fix memory corruption with too many bridges

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v4.14.298 by commit e8f916b84e4b028ecad6c6472eaad543cc7df806, it was introduced in version v3.12 by commit a3376e3ec81c5dd0622cbc187db76d2824d31c1c. For more details please see the references link.

OSV.summary: drm/msm/hdmi: fix memory corruption with too many bridges
